about_the_game:
The Golden Kingdom has fallen into ruin - under the thumb of an illegitimate ruler, corruption is spreading and lush lands are turned into barren deserts. It's up to you to rise from the shackles of slavery to becoming the hero that can end the evil overlords's brutal reign.

Golden Kingdom VR is an exploration and fighting game where you go on missions in vast fantasy environments, in order to gain the needed ressources and experience to survive the ordeals that stand in your way to freeing the lands from opression.

FEATURES:

• Explore huge environments in search for knowledge, experience and resources

• Overcome human, animal and supernatural foes

• Solve environmental puzzles to progress

• Unfold the full story of the Golden Kingdom's downfall

As the first open-world VR action RPG to offer infinite visibility and realistic graphics at the same time, Golden Kingdom sets a new standard. Across several 16-square-kilometer maps, players can embark on epic adventures through meticulously designed fantasy worlds. Our goal is to eliminate the feeling of boundaries, immersing players in a world that feels limitless.
​
Photorealistic graphics further enhance the experience, allowing players to truly feel as though they’ve stepped into another realm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X3D
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X3D
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 4090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 3 / Pro
